channel.title: Bi Gan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bi Gan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Shu Qi’s ‘Girl’ and ‘Resurrection’ Among Competition Titles as Busan Film Festival Unveils Lineup for 30th Edition
item.description: The 30th Busan International Film Festival has unveiled its most expansive program yet, featuring 241 official selections, with Taiwanese screen icon Shu Qi both starring in “Resurrection”
